column1: The learned District Judge delivered judgment on 31.08.2000. The learned District Judge
has stated, inter alia, the following reasons for deciding the case in favour of the Plaintiff.

column2: the execution of partnership agreement the document PI and the quit notice P2
have been accepted by the Defendant;
the Defendants have failed to reply to P2;
the Defendants have not discharged evidentiary burden of proving tenancy;
the judgment in the case Jayantha de Alwis and others v.  D.M Appuhamyand
another (supra)  is inapplicable in the context of the facts of this case;
